mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NO, CATE_NO,WRITER,TITLE,CONTENT,ENROLL_DATE, DELETE_YN,MODIFY_DATE,STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL,#{cateNo},1,#{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE,'N',SYSDATE,#{status})
mapper.select: SELECT C.NAME,N.TITLE,N.ENROLL_DATE N.HIT, M.NICK FROM NOTICE N JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON N.CATE_NO= C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = N.WRITER
